relation.text: 1784 AMaria & I together parts of ye . Morning -- Mrs. Vesey paid
that Day . that neither I or Mr. D—
tomorrow . had a little chat wth . Anna Maria went
found a kind letter from the Ducheſs Dr. of Portland at my return home this Eveg . July 17
Saturday . At ½ past 6 o'Clock this Morng . I was much surprised & shock 'd by our Housemaid who came
set out for their House at Sunning Hill for ye . Summer
talk 'd over the disagreeable affair of yesterday
s Bedchamber Women ) had call 'd upon me when I was out . Mrs. Tracy was wth . me in ye Morng . . I had some conversation wth . her abt ye . Queen Monday
a Week on her account . My Uncle Miſs Boyle paid
hands of Young people on many accounts , I have not now
Thursday afternoon . this dear dear Woman was charming
July 1784 -- Breakfasted wth . Dear A M sat
went immediately to our rooms Friday
suffer 'd for the last 3 or 4 days
3 years & c & c this Money is due to A Maria who paid
found her as well as she was on Thursday
had taught them -- the eldest is abt 4 ye youngest 3 years
given to me by M r . Glover for ye Picture . Sunday
July 1784 . Br with Opie we had a tête á tête till near 11 . I aſsisted
4 days ago . his Horses & Grooms were at Miſs Palmer s
paſs 'd both in Ireland & England -- & it was but too true that they were now
arose from his dining wth . him Last Week
Wednesday Read in Mrs. Boughton from 6 till 8 -- breakfasted
told me that & she & her husband were now
sent Mrs. Delany to Church -- ye . Thanksgiving
July 1784 Clarges Street Finish 'd Mr Dewes 's
was going into the Country in a day or two
July 1784 . Joind dear A M at 9 o'Clock -- sat
sat up late scribbling & reading . As AMaria has now
end of next Month . Ldy . Stormont sent
August 1784 Breakfasted wth . William . her Cold rather better -- she shew 'd
made of me . Went to May
had put of for a day or two
found her the same as many days
went to my room at 12 Monday
brought me word -- that she was now
found a letter from D—— & a day
